[典]
Ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ): 冊 ( “ books ” ) + 丌 ( “ table ” ) – (official) books on a table.
Unrelated to 曲 and 曹 .

[曲]
Ideogram ( 指事 ) – a bent object. Also simplified from 麴 via the variant character 麯 / 曲 .
Unrelated to 曹 and 典 .

[麴]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *kʰuɡ ): semantic 麥 + phonetic 匊 ( OC *kluɡ ) .

[麹] variant form of 麴.
